name: Where is my head? (CharmerLena)
description:
This is a short minimalist shooting game :)

The purpose of the game: to create the player's head and not be defeated by enemies.

The task of the game is to catch (shoot) in parts of the face, choosing one of them.

Control Player: кeyboard, mouse

Left = a

Right = d

Up = w

Down = s

Fire = Left mouse button

 Music theme: https://pixabay.com/

Grow your head!
